#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t,n,out;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(n==0)
			out=0;
		else if(n<=6)
			out=2;
		else if(n<=75)
			out=3;
		else if(n<=480)
			out=4;
		else if(n<=2205)
			out=5;
		else if(n<=8232)
			out=6;
		else if(n<=26544)
			out=7;
		else
			out=8;
		cout<<out<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
